caption.p: PCA1 biplot along the two principal components; associating opponent species (LhC: Linepithema humile colonizer, LhR: L. humile resident; Ln: facing Lasius neglectus, Lni: facing Lasius niger, alone: without opponent) with eight variables reflecting space occupation by L. humile and its ability to exploit resources (n = 60; ellipses confidence intervals of 0.9; large points = mean points of groups (barycenters)).
